tables_on_page.title: Protection Function
tables_on_page.summary: Table of protection function: Protection Function

text:
PRODUCT DATASHEET
BDM-2000 MICROINVERTER SPECIFICATIONS
CEC Listing as Utility Interactive Grid Support Inverter Input (DC)
(NC0171-US, NC0165-US) Recommended Max PV Power: 750 W x 4
Max Isc Current: 25 A x 4
MPPInput Current: 18A x 4
MPPT Tracking Accuracy: >99%
MPPT Tracking Range: 22 – 55 Vdc
Allowable Power Grid Voltage: 211-264 Vac 3φ: 183-228 Vac 3φ: 243-305 Vac
Rated Output Current: 8.0A 3φ: 8.0 A 3φ: 7.22 A
Maximum Units Per Branch (30A): 3 units 3φ: 3 units/phase3φ: 3 units/phase
Allowable Power Grid Frequency: 59.3 - 60.5 Hz (adjustable)
THD: < 5% (at rated power)
Power Factor (cos phi, fixed): 0.9un~0.9ov
STANDARD DIMENSIONS Current (inrush) (Peak and Duration): 24 A peak / 15μs
mm Nominal Frequency: 60 Hz
Max Output Fault Current: 26.0 A peak / 662 ms
System Efficiency
Weighted Average Efficiency (CEC): 96.5%
Nighttime Tare Loss: 0.4W
Weight: 13 lbs. (5.9 kg)
Ambient Temperature: -40°F to +149°F (-40°C to +65°C)
Operating Temperature: -40°F to +185°F (-40°C to +85°C)
Certifications
UL 1741, IEEE1547,CSA C22.2, IEC/EN 62109-1, IEC/EN 62109-2, VDE-AR-
N 4105*, VDE V 0126-1-1/A1, G83/2, CEI 21, AS 4777.2, AS 4777.3,
EN50438, ABNT NBR 16149/16150
All NEC required adjustment factors have been considered for AC outputs. AC
current outputs will not exceed stated values for Rated output AC Current.
COMPLIANCE
NEC 2023 Section 690.11 DC Arc-Fault Circuit Protection
NEC 2023 Section 690.12 Rapid Shutdown of PV Systems on Buildings
Per box: 3 pcs Pallet Qty: 99 pcs
NEC 2023 Section 705.12 Point of Connection (AC Arc-Fault Protection)
Boxes per layer: 11 Pallet weight: 1440 lbs.
Layers: 3

**Main components:** The image shows a PV microinverter, model BDM-2000, manufactured by Northern Electric. It features multiple input connectors and an output cable.

*   Components: Pallet, Boxes, Straps
